attributes.action: honor the town of Wootton Bassett for the tireless way in which they honor the servicemen and women who have given their lives in the service of their country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I seek to honor the town of Wootton Bassett for the tireless way in which they honor the servicemen and women who have given their lives in the service of their country. 

There is a precedent for a community to be recognized for its service. The island of Malta was awarded a Victoria Cross for its bravery during World War Two and I believe there is justification for a similar award for gallantry due to the people of Wootton Bassett.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
